data.text: @SamuelHillNZ @MatthewHootonNZ yep, there’s a ‘playbook’ for national disasters. that’s the whole ‘rally around the flag syndrome’. policy is policy & the government could organise a piss up at a pub. PR is great, but competence is non-existent
@MatthewHootonNZ wonder what cause célèbre this 🤡  be on next week
@MatthewHootonNZ They're feeling threatened.. All they have to moan about is the colour of a man's skin, yet he'll be the first to shout RACIST - Hypocrisy buffet.
@MatthewHootonNZ What on earth…. Who tf votes thinking of others? Who are these people and what have they been taught?
@MatthewHootonNZ Especially when the real solution to COVID was - weaker COVID.
@MatthewHootonNZ I worked at the White Island opearation. She was only there for the photo op!

@MatthewHootonNZ The White Island episode was political the Island should of been closed by the Government so the public were not at risk,
I still feel sorry for all concerned.
@aniobrien @MatthewHootonNZ That’s sickening, especially in light of him highlighting Jacinda’s handling of the Christchurch massacre.
@MatthewHootonNZ Why are all these people obsessed with race? We see who the real fascists are.
